mainText: Steve Jobs what can i say? a man who changed the world a man who changed technology. a man who changed the way we live. a kind man. a generous man, but most of all a man Who changed the way we think. a role model for millions. He made us THINK DIFFERENT. so i send my condolences to jobs and apple and to his family. RIP jobs i just know you are having a blast in your icloud. that is steve jobs
author: Morgan
